135501.name: Korinthea
135501.description:
From publisher blurb:

Planetary Tool Kits are a collection of tools that you can use to build adventures, they aren’t just world write-ups but tool kits! Each includes:

Array of useful and imagination-catching world locations
Typical NPC encounters
Several animals with stats
A vehicle unique to the world
Character ‘personalities’
Encounter table
List of adventure seeds tailored to the world in question




‘It’s not the destination, it’s what you do when you get there!’


Korinthea!

A waterworld where 760 million live on an island the size of Sicily. A world with incredible overpopulation, where people are murdered for their organs, where crime gangs control the government from behind the scenes, where no-one has any privacy, anywhere at any time, where food is recycled from rubbish bins and millions live in desperate shanty-towns ...

Off-worlders are not just a novelty on Korinthea, for many people they are a way off planet. Get sucked into the ultra-urban mega-city of Korinthea...

135502.name: Dinosaur War
135502.description:
Dinosaur War brings you back to the most fierce prehistoric battles!

Dark force overwhelmed the lost land, destroying the homeland where men and dinosaurs have lived in harmony for so long. Survivors are determined to unite with dinosaur allies and expel the evil off the land.

- Build mines, pastures, stone quarries to prepare resources;
- A variety of dinosaurs and ancient beasts wait for your recruitment;
- Build Prey Fences, Terror Swamps, etc, to accommodate and recruit troops;
- Win battles to obtain equipment strengthening your power;
- Choose your weapons and armor to get equipped before fighting;
- Jurassic Shop provides extra options of equipment for you;
- Use crystals smartly to accelerate production, resurrect dead soldiers, etc.;
- Increase population limit with decorations;
- Log in often to win gold eggs;
- Complete daily goals to win extra rewards;
- Challenge other players online at Arena to improve your troop force.
- Watch out "Overpower Rules" in central base.

Source: The Game Website.

135503.name: Warband
135503.description:
From publisher blurb:

At that insult Leir gave the command. The carnyxes blew, and the two armies fell upon each other. Then there was hacking and smiting; heads were broken and limbs hewn off, there was neighing and trampling of horses, and the bitter cries of men meeting violent death.
The High Kings, Joy Chant

Forget the legions! Create British tribal heroes and druids, read how to run a tribal campaign with or without the Roman presence, and how to fight large scale battles with thousands of troops, cavalry and chariots.

Clan organisation is explained, rules for honour and the pursuit of glory are also covered. Become a hero within your tribe, a champion amongst champions ... take heads, hoard your cattle and raid your enemies!

135504.name: Dungeons the Dragoning 40,000 7th Edition Core Book (Version 1.6z)
135504.description:
From publisher blurb:


ROLEPLAYING IN THE BRIGHT NOBILITY OF THE 41ST MILLENIUM

Prepare to venture forth with your bold companions into a world of heroic fantasy. Within these pages, you’ll discover all the tools and options you need to create characters worthy of song and legend for the Dungeons the Dragoning game, and how to create adventures to show them the horrors and wonders of the Great Wheel.

Wars rage over airless moons, in the dark, twisted depths of hive worlds and in the cold waste of the Astral Sea. From the immaterial realm of the Warp, malicious entities send their unspeakable horrors to corrupt the universe. Terrible beings from the depths of ancient time awaken to begin their March. The Blood War between the forces of Law and Chaos leaves only ruin and death in its wake. Even the bastion of galactic civilization, Sigil, isn’t safe.

There is no time for peace.

No respite.

No forgiveness.

There is only adventure.

135505.name: Jeu des Poulettes
135505.description:
From the box: "Help your pullet make its way to freedom! Be the first to arrive by steering clear of the henhouse!"

Players begin by building a path from the henhouse to the medals podium by putting together a simple puzzle. Then the race is on! Players take turns rolling the die and moving their chicken to the next color rolled. Landing on +2 eggs will move your chicken along faster, but watch out for -2 eggs and henhouses, which will slow you down! The first chicken to the end wins!

This game is language independent.

135507.name: Erobreren
135507.description:
Conqueror (Erobreren) is a Norwegian family quiz game based on history from antiquity to the present. It is published by Kunnskapsforlaget (Knowledge Publications) and is therefore focused on being both an educational, as well as entertaining experience.

There is a questions and tasks timeline - players position events
and people in the correct chronological order – spanning three levels:
Bronze: based on the school curriculum
Silver: based on high school curriculum
Gold: suitable for history buffs

Conqueror is a board game based on the six historical eras. Each player or team must collect 6 Conqueror cards from different historical eras. These cards you win by solving timeline puzzles.

Luck also plays a role - it is not always the most knowledgeable that wins this game.

Players can also gain Fate Cards that can lead to a player being thrown in the dungeon, or maybe get help from a Moon card - which acts as a wildcard. Players my draw a Sun Card to overcome curses, death and destruction.

The point of the game is that many people may know more history than they think! In this game you have the chance to deduce the correct answer.
You learn a lot along the way and you can certainly start at the Bronze level to build you up. At Gold level, you can safely call yourself a historian of rank.
The game is beautifully designed and has many fine images of famous people and historical events.
Answers are provided with additional information to provide context and add educational value to the playing experience.

135508.description:
The Shaman is old. A future practitioner must be chosen to guide the others into their altered states of consciousness for the purpose of physical and psychic healing. As part of an ancient tradition, apprentices gather around a fire to drink a strong mushroom potion. The Shaman's quarters are warm and comfortable. The fire burns in the middle of the hut. Smoke moves through a hole in the roof. The sun will set soon.

The Shaman and each apprentice drink from the bowl simmering near the fire. The taste, bitter and revolting. The Shaman's assistant does not drink; he stands calmly beside her. The assistant is invisible. Adorned in animal skins and strange ornaments, the Shaman begins to guide the ritual. A drum is tapped with elderly fingers, creating a primitive disjointed rhythm. The weathered drum is played for some time, then stops abruptly. The Shaman looks about the room. She looks up to the ceiling, observing the smoke escaping into the sky.

"The plants now speak to us."

In the adventure board game The Mushroom Eaters, 2-5 players are apprentices who have consumed a drink of the psilocybin mushroom. Each player enters into a psychedelic state together. The Shaman is guiding and observing the group, trying to understand who would be the wisest to replace her. While the group travels together, some may wander into faraway realms of their own mind, but when the mushroom wears off everyone will return. The wisest apprentice is chosen to guide the village in the future.

This is the first game in a series to incorporate an "Action Path". Each player uses a hand of cards to help the group advance along this path. If cards are played correctly, the path may help the individual or the group entirely; if cards are played poorly, the entire group could be affected by the changes in the environment. Players aim to gain Experience by awakening to new understandings, centering one's self in the oblivion of the moment, gaining intense realities witnessed in the Great Paradox, and building wisdom from profound revelations.
135508.name: The Mushroom Eaters

135510.name: Go For Broke
135510.description:
"Go For Broke" is fast-paced dice game where you can risk it all to get rewards and win! Roll as long as you dare to claim first a 20, then a 50, then a 100 and finally a 200 point card. Pick up "insurance" on the way. But watch out - if you roll Go + For + Broke - you're busted and lose your gains in the current round! All players who earn 200 points face-off in an intense playoff round.

Will you claim victory or will you "Go For Broke?"

135511.name: Blue Exorcist: The Phantom Labyrinth of Time
135511.description:
User Summary

Blue Exorcist: The Phantom Labyrinth of Time is based on the manga Blue Exorcist. It's a visual novel mixed with RPG style combat.

135513.name: Rhiannon: Curse of the Four Branches
135513.description:
From the back of the box

'The Sullivan's home is a remote farmstead miles from civilization. As you enter the home, you feel something isn't right. Discover dark secrets as you encounter an ancient evil lurking in the walls of the home that holds a terrible connection to a timeless struggle between man and magic.'

135514.name: Dungeon Explorer: Warriors of Ancient Arts
135514.description:
The bulk of the storyline for Meiyaku no Tobira takes place in various dungeons, as the title implies. Each dungeon is unlocked after various quests are completed by acquiring "plates" and can be leveled up by inserting jewels in said plates. Each level is more challenging than the previous one and can be selected at any given time. At one point Dungeon level progression is stopped until an item called a Sirius Jewel is acquired, a reusable item that unlocks further dungeon empowerment. Specific levels have specific challenges in them, such as Level 6 of a dungeon are considered blind; without the usage of a specific item, the mini-map is blanked out with only the character icons visible.

Source: Wikipedia, "Dungeon Explorer: Warriors of Ancient Arts", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

135515.name: Dawn of Magic 2
135515.description:
STORY

Ten years have passed since the Undead Modo has been destroyed. Now his minions have returned to avenge his death. The fragile balance of powers is shattered, peace is broken and the shadow legions drown the world in sorrow, horror and suffering.

You don't have much time left to stop the dark creatures. Use your magical skills, over hundred freely combinable spells and your blade to save the world once again from total destruction. Are you ready for a fantastic journey through the labyrinth of worlds to stop the invasion of the shadow legions in "Dawn of Magic 2"?
FEATURES

Balanced magic system based on 12 schools of magic with over 100 spells that can be combined
Improved character development
Transfer of Dawn of Magic characters
Impressive battles against 12 infernal end bosses
Dozens of new characters and monsters
Advanced graphics engine with new locations and impressive visuals
Dangerous and exciting adventures in the heart of a mysterious shadow world
16 new music tracks and tons of spoken dialogue
Entirely new story set 10 years after the events of Dawn of Magic
Conflicts between various factions and the choice of siding with one or another

Source: The Publisher Website.

135517.name: Salvation Prophecy
135517.description:
User Summary

Salvation Prophecy is a mix of third-person ground combat and space dogfights, with light RPG elements. The game website says:

Salvation Prophecy is a military space epic. Human, mutant, and robotic factions are at war for galactic domination. Battles rage as space fleets collide, and planet invasions clash against fortified enemy colonies. Yet the greatest danger is the impending annihilation foretold by an apocalyptic prophecy. You must seek out the mysteries of distant alien worlds, and master ancient powers to withstand the coming storm.

More information on http://www.salvationprophecy.com/

135518.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
135518.description:
User Summary

The video game based on the last Harry Potter movie. Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 is a third person shooter adventure game, that allows players to take control of Harry, Ron, Hermionie, and 5 more characters, as they battle, to determine the fate of Hogwarts, the horcruxes and Voldemort himself.

135519.name: Recruits
135519.description:
Recruits is a squad based top down shooter. Inspired by games like Cannon Fodder, Alien Swarm and Jagged Alliance Recruits puts players on the front lines of the battlefield to accomplish your missions through any means necessary. Fast paced and packed with explosions, Recruits offers a wide variety of features that allow you, and your friends to take command of the action and lead your men to victory.

Source: The Game Website.

135521.name: Tanks of War: Third Reich Rising
135521.description:
Tanks of War (TOW) is a fast playing 2-4-player WW2 deck building board game of strategy, skill and maneuver of massive tank battles on the Eastern Front designed to play in about an hour. Using new and innovative deck building and battle mechanics, TOW pits the Germans vs. the Soviet Union during the opening salvos of World War 2. Each vehicle has been painstakingly researched and then converted into game play terms to ensure maximum realism without being bogged down in game play minutia. When your fighting a T-34 with your Panzer 4, it will be based on historical technical info!

TOW is a unique combination of a board game, miniatures game (without the minis) and deck building game. The strategies are endless and the turns are tense with each shot making a difference!

TOW brings the intensity of WW2 tank battles into an easy-to-understand and play format which will delight historical buffs and casual gamers looking for deep strategy, explosive turns, and pitch battles.

GAME PLAY OVERVIEW

Players customize their own unique battle deck which includes cards that alter game play and vehicles such as mighty KV-1s, Panzers, and tank destroyers. Played over a massive game board, both sides must purchase the right action cards and vehicles to win.

COMPONENTS

Tanks of War comes with 2 decks that both the Germans and Soviet Union/Russians can customize, game board, tokens, dice and much more.

One massive 23 inch game board representing the plains of Russia
2 Player Reference Cards
Battle Dice including d4, d6, d8, and d10 dice
Over 100 double sided full color tokens
Over 200 double sided full color game cards with authentic photos representing various models of Panzers, T-34s, KV1s and many more. Also included are Force Cards which can alter game rules and give your tank commanders the edge they need on the battlefield
20+ page full color rulebook with variants and historical scenarios that create endless re-playability
10 Terrain Cards
Note: components are being finalized and may change

DECK BUILDING

Unique to Tanks of War is the ability for players to customize their deck prior to the game. This allows gamers to field the right mix of vehicles and Force Cards to meet the challenges they’ll face on the battlefield!

PLAY TIME

Players can choose to play a quick 30 minute game or set up a mighty clash lasting upwards to 1.5 hours.

135522.name: Triad
135522.description:
Triad is a two-phase abstract strategy game.

The game played on an 8x8 grid with the middle four spaces unavailable for play, leaving 60 playable spaces. Of the 60 spaces, 40 are labeled "3" and the remaining 20 are labeled "6", values which only apply during Phase 2. Each player or team has 30 pyramid pieces available to play. Play consists of two phases with an option of playing only one phase for children.

In Phase 1, players alternate turns and attempt to make as many triads as possible, scoring three points for each turn in which one or more Triads are made. A placement which results in multiple Triads being formed still only scores three points. Triads consist of three playing pieces in a row in any direction - diagonally or orthogonally, including a stack. Playing pieces may not be stacked more than three high. Score is kept in real time via a scoring track and moving plastic marker along the edge of the board.

In Phase 2, Triads are removed. If the removal of a Triad reveals numbers on the board, those numbers - three or six - are added to the player's score. If a Triad stack is removed, the single revealed number is doubled. If a player has a Triad available to him to remove, he must remove it, even though it's to his strategic disadvantage. If he cannot remove one, the other player or team plays until he has an available move or both players have no Triads that can be removed. Keeping track of number placement when laying Triads is strategically wise.

135523.description:
Once sky had no day. There was a Shadow that was sad, it could only play in small light of a lantern. The Shadow found a hole in the sky and decided to steal enough lanterns to fill it. It took many generations, and when it was done the shadow slept under its big light, dreaming dreams about how it would play. When it awoke, all of the light was gone! At the center of the hole in the sky, was a tiny shinning entity, with a great big mouth. The shadow named the tiny thing the sun and they played forever.

A showdown with the Sunstalker will test players ability to position their survivors and make coordinated attacks. Making use of their own shadows to turn the tides of the battle. Its rewards grant new long range options and an evasive burst damage armor set, that is low on actual armor levels.
135523.name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Sunstalker Expansion

135524.description:
A small trivia game containing 98 questions about Austria.

Each card contains a question on the front and an answer on the backside (which is not the answer to the question on the other side of that card).

The cards are shuffled and evenly distributed to all players. One player asks a question from one of his cards; now all other players try to find the right answer on the backside of their cards. If a player has the card with the right answer he gets one point and is the next player to ask a question.

The winner is the player with the most points. The game also contains rules for solitaire play.
135524.name: Österreich: Lernspiel für Jung und Alt

135525.name: Towers of Krshal
135525.description:
From the Lulu description:

This little, 32-paged booklet contains additional materials for city-oriented campaigns - random tables, lists, generators and maps.

135526.name: Hansa Tradelines
135526.description:
Hansa Tradelines is a route and pattern building game in which players take the roles of merchant citizens of a city part of the old European Hansa league.

It allows many simple and complex play modalities, but in the basic one players have to build their routes and connect their cities to a single starting city which is placed in the middle of the table. In their turn, players have to decide wether to place a route-tile, which is taken from a common face-down tile pile, or a city-tile, which is taken from the players own limited city-tile reserve. Players have to decide the best position for each of their tiles so that they ensure their own connections and prevent other players from doing so in order to achieve victory, which is based on a pointing system related to the geometric connectivity of a hexagon.

135527.name: Lovopoly
135527.description:
A game of Monopoly that you can have custom-made to include places that are special to you and your loved one, romance-themed cards, and photos of you and your loved one on the game board, instructions, and even player pawns.

http://www.lovopoly.com

135528.name: Ancient World
135528.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dhuran; a foreboding planet abandoned by the gods. 500 years after the gods rained fire and brimstone upon the land, leaving the few survivors to fend for themselves, secrets are being uncovered. The new civilization of the now godless Dhuran find the malevolent spirits of their long-dead ancestors hunting their descendant bloodline. As if being accosted by the spirits of their ancestors isn’t enough, tears are opening between the mortal and chaos realms, pouring demons, enslavers, and the undead into the world. Though the people have managed to live and grow since that apocalyptic event, they now fight against the denizens of a planet that wants them dead.

Become a warrior and scour the land, protecting your kin and their allies. Fight back against the evil that spills across the land. Raise your sword in defiance; harness the corrupting power of the spirit realm and strike down the chaos; scribe the chaos runes and use the realm’s power against itself; use alchemical knowledge to launch grenades in the face of your foe; take on the role of a hunter seeking out the plagued beings that cross the land; or fight in the name of the gods that left you behind as a crusader determined to bring the gods back to Dhuran. In ANCIENT WORLD, you fight for the survival of those around you: drow, dwarf, half-drow, halfling, and human; you either find victory or become a victim of the chaos your ancestors created, because everything you don’t understand, can and will kill you.

Inside the ANCIENT WORLD core setting guide you will find:

An introduction to the history of Dhuran and the current state of the Known Lands.
Five character races.
New Edges and Hindrances.
A change to Arcane Backgrounds with four new options.
A guide to the Known Lands.
Over 25 new, unique creatures to torment the PCs.
Two pregenerated adventures.

135529.name: Ancient World Player's Guide
135529.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dhuran; a foreboding planet abandoned by the gods. 500 years after the gods rained fire and brimstone upon the land, leaving the few survivors to fend for themselves, secrets are being uncovered. The new civilization of the now godless Dhuran find the malevolent spirits of their long-dead ancestors hunting their descendant bloodline. As if being accosted by the spirits of their ancestors isn’t enough, tears are opening between the mortal and chaos realms, pouring demons, enslavers, and the undead into the world. Though the people have managed to live and grow since that apocalyptic event, they now fight against the denizens of a planet that wants them dead.

Become a warrior and scour the land, protecting your kin and their allies. Fight back against the evil that spills across the land. Raise your sword in defiance; harness the corrupting power of the spirit realm and strike down the chaos; scribe the chaos runes and use the realm’s power against itself; use alchemical knowledge to launch grenades in the face of your foe; take on the role of a hunter seeking out the plagued beings that cross the land; or fight in the name of the gods that left you behind as a crusader determined to bring the gods back to Dhuran. In ANCIENT WORLD, you fight for the survival of those around you: drow, dwarf, half-drow, halfling, and human; you either find victory or become a victim of the chaos your ancestors created, because everything you don’t understand, can and will kill you.

Inside the ANCIENT WORLD PLAYER’S GUIDE you will find:

An introduction to the history of Dhuran and the current state of the Known Lands.
Five character races.
New Edges and Hindrances.
A change to Arcane Backgrounds with four new options.




This PLAYER’S GUIDE is designed for those who only want to create characters for the ANCIENT WORLD setting and is suitable for virtually any dark fantasy setting.

135530.description:
In May of 1863 the Confederacy was winning battles but losing the war. In the west Grant was moving on Vicksburg. In the east, the Army of Northern Virginia was holding off the Army of the Potomac, but Lee realized that this could not last forever. Something had to change, he would strike north and take the war to the enemy. After weeks of maneuver, a chance collision between the two armies would seal the fate of the Confederacy. Now is your chance to change history. Can you do better than Lee and crush the Union army as it arrives piecemeal? Or as Meade will you hold the heights and dash the last great hope of Confederate victory? The decisions are yours… in Gettysburg 150!

Gettysburg 150 is an expansion of the ideas contained in Hold the Line. Like Hold the Line, it uses command action points for units to move and attack. The CRT is simliar, although artillery is weaker at longer ranges due to the greater scale of the battle. However, the board is not modular and infantry units are stronger. Units are division level, with brigade level cavalry. Advanced features like column movement is covered simply with movement bonuses for not moving adjacent to enemy units. More importantly, the game has optional rules to increase realism, including early reinforcements, army demoralization due to heavy losses, and rules to encourage corps organization. The game has 4 scenarios covering days 1, 2, and 3, as well as the Confederate attack on Little Round Top on July 2. Scenarios are playable in 1 hour for the day battles, 20 to 30 minutes for the Little Round Top scenario. The complete 3 day battle is playable in 2.5 to 3 hours.

A division level Gettysburg game in honor of the 150th anniversary of the battle. This simple fast playing game comes with a mounted 25 x 22 map, two counter sheets, rules, and dice. You can play the entire battle in 2 to 3 hours, with 4 shorter scenarios.

Players will maneuver the counters representing the Union and Confederate armies across a hex cover representation of the battlefield at Gettysburg. Each turn players get a number of action points that will allow them to maneuver, fire combat, and close combat enemy forces. You will always receive some action points, but will never be sure exactly how many recreating the uncertainty of command and control. Victory is obtained by driving the enemy from the field by capturing terrain objectives or eliminating enemy units.

The game uses the popular Hold the Line game system as its base. Optional rules include a Chaos of War table, force march, and more.

Includes a mounted game board, 2 counter sheets with large 7/8" counter sheets, dice, and rules.
135530.name: Gettysburg 150

135531.name: The Old Absinthe House Blues
135531.description:
From Introduction and site details.

She was an ebon goddess on a dirty stage, belting out tunes to the locals every Friday and Saturday night at the Old Absinthe House. Delilah loved Bourbon Street. She sang to the drunks and the sailors and the roustabouts and they sang back. They sang in quiet murmurs and lewd catcalls and the clink of the ice in their glasses. Delilah loved the chatter—even while she sang. She loved everything about Bourbon Street, and she tweeted at them like a canary out of its cage.

But something's happened to Delilah. Something that will lead your party around the Crescent City and beyond.

The Old Absinthe House Blues is the first full-length adventure for Deadlands Noir, built for a party of Novice characters with gum on their shoes and icewater in their veins.

135533.name: The Book of Earth

rpg.4996: Legend of the Five Rings (4th Edition)

135533.description:
From publisher blurb:

"Be like unto the earth, and you shall endure forever."
– Isawa Norimichi, Master of Earth

The earth is the rock upon which the Empire of Rokugan has stood proudly for more than one thousand years, both as a metaphor and a very real truth. They are the essence and soul of the Crab Clan, as well as the power and the determination of the Dragon. Countless families and Fortunes are of Earth, and their works within the mortal realm depend upon its strength to shape the face of destiny.

The Book of Earth is the second in a series of elemental sourcebooks that will explore the themes of each of the five elemental Rings. From the quiet, stolid fortresses that stand quietly against the force of the Empire’s enemies, to the crushing violence of a tetsubo, every aspect of the eternal essence of Earth is examined.

In this book you will find explorations of the following:

Sumai and its traditions throughout the clans
The devastating use of heavy weapons in the martial philosophy of Rokugan
Spells concerning containment and resistance
Kiho utilized by the Brotherhood of Shinsei
The silent, foreboding fortress known simply as the Lair

135534.description: Rolling Freight: Great Britain and India, an expansion for Rolling Freight, includes a double-sided game board that features maps of Great Britain and India and new rules for canals, ferries and caravans. Canals are links that exist at the start of the game, but which become owned by individual players when rail is built over them. Cargo can also be moved using ferries and caravans, which are permanent map placements that cost one dice to cross. These new maps also include rules for improvements that decrease in cost as the phases advance.
135534.name: Rolling Freight: Great Britain and India

135535.description:
War Against Russia is a free Print and Play game covering the German assault against Russia. It is an introductory wargame designed to introduce people to wargames. The map covers the area between the Baltic Sea and the Black Sea. The game covers the time frame of May 1941 to May 1942 with each turn representing a month.

Each turn the players will move units, attack, and check supply. Supply lines are determined by counting hexes from roads, cities, and the edge of the board. (The number of hexes ranges from three to six, depending on the weather.)

Weather is determined each turn and can range from clear to muddy, snowy, hard frost, or subarctic. Each type of weather affects movement, and attacks.

Combat is determined by rolling on a Combat Results Table. Movement is determined by the unit movement value combined with the terrain effects.
135535.name: War Against Russia

135536.name: Realms of Power: The Divine (Revised Edition)
135536.description:
user comment

While substantially the same book as the original Realms of Power: The Divine, the Revised Edition features a substantially rewritten Judaism chapter.

From the publisher's website:

God is the patron of the Jewish people, his chosen people, guiding them through history and ultimately back to the Promised Land.

God is three and one, incarnate in Christ His Son, and offers salvation to all equally.

God is pure unity, with no parents or children, saving all who submit to His Will.

God is beyond human understanding, and all the above statements are true.

But the Divine Realm is not completely beyond human comprehension, and this book explains the power of God in Mythic Europe. From descriptions of each of the three great Divine religions, Judaism, Christianity, and Islam, to rules for Divinely-empowered wonder workers and angels, this book contains everything needed to include the Divine in your Ars Magica saga.

135537.name: Killer Escape
135537.description:
Trapped in a cell you awake confronted by a twisted serial killer known as 'The burner'
Your task is simple, you have to get the hell out of here before he comes back!!

Source: The Developer Website.

135539.name: Being One: Escape the Lab
135539.description:
Description on the title screen
You awake inside a vat, liquid bubbling up in front of your eyes...
You have no idea where you are, who you are or what you are.
Your eyes take awhile to adjust to your surroundings.
You must get out of this vat and escape this vile laboratory...

135540.name: Being One: Bloodbath
135540.description:
From Title screen

You escaped from the vat of life-supporting fluid and found yourself in a lab...
You discovered some alien specimens and...

135541.name: Being One: Dark Matter
135541.description:
From Title screen

'You escaped from the vat in a science lab and discovered they were experimenting on 'Aliens'.
You then made your way upwards only to find another lab...'

135542.name: Being One: Moonrise
135542.description:
From Title screen
'What's left of the moon has shifted into view of the Asteroid from behind the Earth.
This could have a profound effect on some of the inhabitants.'

135543.name: Natur und Technik: Uppland & Scientia
135543.description:
user summary

This sourcebook for LodlanD contains details on the two RDL countries Uppland and Scientia. The book contains wide information and a small adventure for each country.

135544.name: Being One: Infection
135544.description:
From Title screen-
'First things first, you are encased in a complex armoured suit and as such you have certain tools and information'

135545.name: Beginning Spellbooks
135545.description:
From publisher blurb:

For the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. Spellbooks should be more than simply lists of spells! Contains 4 starting spellbooks that can be used as random treasure, known spells for non-player characters, or starting gear for new player characters. Also includes a sampler of higher-level spellbooks from other entries in the Spellbooks series.

135546.name: Elemental Builder
135546.description:
From publisher blurb:

A gamemaster aid for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. The official Bestiaries have different sizes and rankings of elemental creatures, but there are no guidelines for creating your own as there are for dragons and other creatures. Now you can! Create elementals of any or all size categories!

135547.description:
Zpocalypse introduced the mechanics of Quick Play Rules with the “Day Zero” Scenario. Numerous scenarios within Zmergency are played using these mechanics and provide a shortened game play experience for those looking for some quick and dirty combat.

The Quick Play Scenario is a Combat Phase only game that ignores all other Phases. The map is expanded in a different manner than the Main Game Scenario. You start with just one tile (determined by the Scenario being played), and on each turn you may walk off of the board and place a new tile . In Zpocalypse, players roll a die to determine how many zombies spawn on that tile.
Zmergency Rules differ in that they utilize the deck of Encounter Cards.
135547.name: Zpocalypse: Zmergency

135548.name: Eastern Weapons
135548.description:
From publisher blurb:

A collection of 63 new and magical weapons inspired by Eastern cultures. Requires the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook and Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat.

135549.name: The Thief of Memories
135549.description:
From the Back Cover:

ARCANA AGENCY: THE THIEF OF MEMORIES

New York, October 1932. Malevolent forces are at work.

Strange things are happening in New York. When the detectives of Arcana Agency are called upon to discover how and why a corpse has walked out of a hospital morgue, they soon realize that this is only the first in a chain of bizarre events will forever blur the divide between life and death - and that will strike at the heart of Arcana Agency itself.

In this adventure YOU must guide detectives Humphrey Brown, Joe Strelli and Tom Shanigan through three intertwining adventures.


In 'The Mystery of the Morgue Marauder,' Humphrey Brown and Tom Shanigan must retrace the steps of Charlie Strubb - a man supposedly shot dead just 24 hours earlier. Why is a corpse leaving a trail of crimes across New York?
In 'The Mystery of the Murdered Marvelous Mask,' Joe Strelli's evening at the theater is ruined when a stage magician is killed by a strangely elusive assassin.
Finally, in 'The Thief of Memories' the three detectives begin to see how recent events fit together, and they must face a wholly inhuman foe - a being that is able to elude memory itself.


YOUR choices will decide if the detectives are successful, and whether the Thief of Memories remains free to terrorize New York.

135550.name: Family Party: 30 Great Games – Obstacle Arcade
135550.description:
Family Party: 30 Great Games Obstacle Arcade brings home wacky and wild competitions for kids of all ages. Exclusively for the Wii U™ system from Nintendo, Obstacle Arcade lets players participate in over 30 party games specifically designed for multiplayer. Delivering an unmatched combination of variety and value, it features dozens of hysterical obstacle courses, popular sporting events, and arcade and brain challenges.

Family Party: 30 Great Games Obstacle Arcade takes players to “Family Party Land”, a magical island loaded with a combination of familiar games and over-the-top challenges. Dodge barrels, ride horses, skydive, shoot rockets, kick goals, and more. Rule the island by earning medals and high scores, and unlocking new games.

Features

Over 30 fun party games that highlight the all-new Wii U™ system!

- Use the all-new Wii U™ GamePad in special 1-on-3 multiplayer challenges
- Aim and shoot with the Wii U™ GamePad to kick soccer balls or to act as a game master in hidden card games and obstacle course challenges.
- Tilt the Wii U™ GamePad to roll giant balls, to fly through space in zero gravity, or to block projectiles as a shield
- Track high scores and game progress on the Wii U™ GamePad’s display

Loaded with fun games custom made for family play, including tons of extreme obstacle courses, sports, and arcade game challenges.

- Over the top obstacles: Giant bouncing balls, alligator jumping, crazy hurdles, jetpacks vs. rocket launchers, and other thrills!
- Sports: Everything from air hockey to eating contests to rodeo
- Fun for the whole family: Arcade games, card games, and more

An unmatched combination of variety and value!

- All games designed for 4-player multiplayer and all-ages family competition
- Win trophies and achieve high scores to unlock new games and characters

Source: The Publisher Website.

135551.name: Mahjong 3D: Warriors of the Emperor
135551.description:
Meet the challenge and become the real Mahjong master!
Go back to Mahjong’s Asian roots and follow the campaign of Emperor Qin Shi Huangdi as he conquers and unites China. It’s up to you to decide on the best strategic move: Do you want to defeat Chu first or head north towards Wei to persuade them to join your side?

Experience the world famous Chinese board game for the first time in real 3D. With a humorous story and charming characters you will enjoy endless fun with that classic game on your Nintendo 3DS!

Key Features

- Seven different worlds and over 80 levels in conquer mode.
- Quick Play mode with 90 puzzles playable in easy, normal and hard modes.
- Beautiful 3D scenes as backgrounds.
- Cool special effects in real 3D: The tites are really jumping out at you!
- Level editor: The player can create his own Mahjong board and formation.
- Hidden unlockables (extra levels, tile designs, etc.) will add to the replay value.
- Debate level: Who will finish first? Play against your enemies on the same Mahjong board.
- Exchange of high scores, unlockables and character progress through StreetPass mode.

Source: The Publisher Website.

135552.name: Tome of Missing Magic
135552.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Missing Magic series has now been reformatted and assembled into one easy-to-use document! 96 pages, hundreds of magic items, dozens of artifacts, armor and weapon templates, new item creation feats. one book, one great price!

135553.name: Forager's Guild
135553.description:
From publisher blurb:

An organization for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. The Forager’s Guild is society of professional adventurers, founded by retired adventurers, and serves as a useful ally for player characters and a helpful tool for gamemasters. A plug-and-play organization that the gamemaster can use anywhere, in any campaign. It has no express goals or political motives save those you and your group choose to impose upon them. Includes NPC mentors, details of the great Guildhall, and information on customizing the Guild for your own setting.

135554.name: The Infinity Rings
135554.description:
From publisher blurb:

A collection of 52 mischievous magical Rings, some highly useful, some annoyingly cursed, some purely of whimsical value, one a true artifact.

135555.name: Art of the Fabled Lands Book 1
135555.description:
From the Introduction:

This artbook contains selected visuals from the iPhone and iPad apps Fabled Lands released in 2011 by Megara Entertainment on Apple's App Store. They have been reworked for this artbook and include never seen before material (including new text descriptions) as well as black & white roughs. When a number appears below a picture, it should correspond to the number of the section from the Fabled Lands pen-and-paper first gamebook The War-Torn Kingdom, reprinted recently.

135556.name: Candy Land the Train Game
135556.description:
Candy Land the Train Game is a game for very young children.

The object of the game is to collect a token from each of the train stations. On their turn, players move the Candy Train to a station of their choice, and reveal a die under the train. If the color matches the color of the station, they get to take a token from that station.

135557.description:
Wizard's Brew is a reimplementation of the Spiel des Jahres-nominated Das Amulett. Players are wizards who use their energy to power spells and collect ingredients from the game board. Collect the right combination of ingredients – which varies depending on the number of players – and you win!

Spell cards are the heart and soul of the game. You get two random spells at the start of each game, then can acquire more via short, "once around" auctions at the start of each round. You bid energy cubes in these auctions, and you have only ten, so bid wisely. When you win an auction, you place energy cubes equal to your bid on the spell card. A certain number of these cubes are removed from the card at the end of each round; once the final cube is removed, the spell leaves the game and you lose that power.

Spell cards generate the Element cards depicted on them for their owners. You then use these Element cards to bid on and collect Ingredients. You can bid for Ingredients only with the Elements shown on the landmark tokens on areas of the game board; these tokens are placed randomly each game. To increase the strategy and player interactivity, some Spell cards let you bid extra cards or different cards, while others allow you to change the rules for bidding. After visiting 3-6 areas, with the number being determined by a die roll at the start of the round, the round ends and players remove Energy cubes from their spells.

The game ends as soon as a player collects the required number of ingredients, e.g., in a six-player game, five differently colored ingredients or six ingredients in any combination of colors.
135557.name: Wizard's Brew

135558.name: Drakensang: Phileasson's Secret
135558.description:
User Summary

Drakensang: Phileasson's Secret adds a new chapter to the PC game Drakensang: The River of Time.

135559.name: The Dark Eye: Chains of Satinav
135559.description:
User Summary

The Dark Eye: Chains of Satinav is a point-and-click adventure.

135560.name: War of the Human Tanks
135560.description:
War of the Human Tanks is a story driven strategy game that pits the group of Human Tanks commanded by the player against the opposing Commanding Officers and their forces in a campaign fought on a series of grid-based maps. Players will have to use their wits to upgrade their units and utilize them to the best of their abilities in order to progress throughout the game.

Features

- Fast-paced strategic battles in over 30 maps,
- Use resources earned from battles to develop new tanks,
- Customize your tanks with various modules to deadly effect,
- Multiple endings based on your performance,
- Replay the story keeping your previously earned units and resources,
- Free battle mode to practice and gather extra supplies,
- English localization features two all-new bonus maps, hand-drawn battle backgrounds and an improved user interface

Source: The Publisher Website.

135562.name: Crazy Cubes Bowling
135562.description:
From Rules:

"Line'em up, stack'em, put'em in a trinagle. Any way you play'em, the goal is to "Bowl'em over."


Each player has 2 shots to try to bowl over the Cracy pins.
Score 1 point for every Pin you knock over, and 6 points for a comple strike.
The winner is the player with the most points after 3 rounds."

135563.name: Crazy Cubes Soccer
135563.description:
From Rules:


Roll a Cube - face side up determines who the Goalkeeper is.
Each player takes 5 shots, rotate the eyes to keep score.
Player with the higher score wins.
Set up player targets to practice free kicks.
Set up Referee target and try to knock down to practice accuracy.

135564.description:
During the Qing Dynasty, following the death of the infamous pirate Cheung Po Tsai, four factions compete to claim his treasure map by being the first to sail all the way around Cheung Chau island.

Each round, players must play cards matching the wind direction determined by the spinner, in order to make progress around the board. They can also play cards to shoot at opponents (they can return fire) to move them backwards along the track, steal cards from opponents' hands, swap places with an opponent, or just to move extra spaces or draw extra cards.

Each faction's character has some special abilities. The factions are fishermen, pirates, and the Qing and Portuguese navies. The first player to reach the last (24th) space on the board wins.
135564.name: The Legend of Cheung Po Tsai

135565.name: The Association: A Deed Restricted Game
135565.description:
Welcome to The Association!

Develop the neighborhood, build common property, increase membership, and take control of the community, molding it in your image.

Players act as board members of their own individual associations attempting to establish a master association. Canvas the neighborhood with your volunteers to gain support for your initiatives and work hard to increase the satisfaction of the property owners. The more members to an association mean the more money that can be collected and spent.

Work on your own or in a committee with your fellow board members to change the neighborhood for the better but be careful – only one player can be president of the master association.
Are you ready to play?

135566.name: Bad Haircut
135566.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Official Series Bible for the near future, culture warring, financial apocalyptic setting. All information is presented without rules system information, so you can adapt it to the system of your choice.

135567.name: Blood City Blues
135567.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Official Series Bible for the swashbuckling dark fantasy setting. Scheming nobility, drug dealers, and secret police conspire against each other and everyone else, for control of the city. Information is presented with rules for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game (requires the use of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook and the Pathfinder Gamemastery Guide), and is easily adaptable to the system of your choice.

135568.name: Eerie Exploits of Ranger Company X
135568.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Official Series Bible for the weird Western setting, inspired by the pulps of the 1930’s as well as radio and television shows as diverse as The Lone Ranger and The X Files. Take on the role of a Texas Ranger doing battle with the forces of the supernatural!

135569.name: Kaiju Patrol
135569.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Official Series Bible for the giant monster science fiction action setting. As an agent of the Kaiju Patrol, you investigate weird happenings, fight atomic monsters, and battle the evil Futurons from Golden Planet 713!

135570.name: Knights of Torque & Recoil
135570.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Official Series Bible for the modern day pulp hero roleplaying setting! As an elite member of the Fairhope Foundation, you will battle the insidious Yellow Perilla Cult, a global criminal cartel! Drive fast cars! Shoot big guns! Use amazing super-science! All information is presented without rules system information, so you can adapt it to the system of your choice.

135571.name: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians
135571.description:
From publisher blurb:

Santa Claus Conquers the Martians: The Official Series Bible is a setting based on a (fictional) television series based on the original film. Players take the role of human, elf, and Martian toymakers, working together to bring peace and understanding while foiling the schemes of naughty people from both planets. It is system-independent, meaning you can use the roleplaying game mechanics of your choice to play it. It’s good for a silly one-shot or a short campaign.

135572.name: The Intervention
135572.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Official Series Bible for Greek Myth inspired, super-heroic soap opera roleplaying. There is a Greek god or titan in your ancestry, which has given you great power. It has also given you an incredibly complicated family and social life. You will battle powerful villains to save the world while trying to keep your personal life in order. All information is presented without rules system information, so you can adapt it to the system of your choice.

135573.name: The Official Series Bible
135573.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Series Bible is a format for roleplaying game campaigns. Each setting is called a Pilot, like the first episode of a television series, providing enough information to get started and offering hooks for future adventures, be leaving things open enough for gamemasters to take things in their own direction. All information is presented without rules system information, so you can adapt it to the system of your choice. This is a FREE reference document, usable with any Pilot.

135574.name: Virtual Chess 64
135574.description:
User Summary

Virtual Chess 64 is a fairly strong chess simulation game aimed at novices and veterans of chess alike. Games are supplemented with humorous visual cutscenes intended to amuse players, though these can be turned off via the settings menu. 2D and 3D boards are available, and boards can be rotated using the C-stick to provide better views of the action. Multiple difficulty levels are available, and higher-end difficulties are strong enough to challenge even well-seasoned chess players.

135575.name: Resident Evil 5: Gold Edition
135575.description:
Back of the Box

The critically-acclaimed chapter of the Resident Evil franchise returns with more content than ever before in "RESIDENT EVIL 5 GOLD EDITION." Included is the original best-selling game and a download token for all additional content, including new playable episodes that take you even deeper into Resident Evil lore.

- Explore the horrors of the Spencer mansion as BSAA agents Chris Redfield and Jill Valentine in the new prequel episode "LOST IN NIGHTMARES."

- "DESPERATE ESCAPE" shows the other side of Resident Evil 5 as you take control of Jill and Josh as they fight their way out of Kijuju's Tricell facility.

- "THE MERCENARIES REUNION" brings eight new characters into the bloody fray.

- Battle against hordes of Majini - and even other players - in "VERSUS."

- 4 new costumes ensure you always fight evil in style.

135576.description: Promo card from Essen 2012 adding another mission (scenario)
135576.name: Hooyah: Navy Seals Card Game – Mission – Hostage Rescue Promo Card

135577.description:
The Invasion of Russia (1812). First entry in a new series of games covering the Campaigns of the Napoleonic Wars at low to moderate level of complexity.

At the heart of The Invasion of Russia (1812) are innovative and simple mechanics intended to encapsulate key elements of campaign warfare during the Napoleonic period; sweeping manoeuvres, feints and deceptions, forced marches, the greater flexibility and cohesion of seasoned troops, and the crucial importance of logistics. This is a very playable game with two sheets of large die-cut counters, one map of Russia and bordering states, at a scale of about 33 miles per hex, 15 days per game-turn. Each unit counter roughly represents a division.

The Invasion of Russia (1812) is very much a wargame, with an emphasis is upon the challenges of leading and co-ordinating armies during the Napoleonic period. Victory will generally go to the player who is best able to formulate and implement a cogent strategy aimed at attaining well defined objectives, whilst allowing a margin of error for enemy action and ill-fortune.
135577.name: The Invasion of Russia (1812)

135578.name: Hvad ved du om Danmark
135578.description:
New family quiz game about Denmark.
What all Danes should know about their country!
Questions in varying difficulty allows the entire family to play this game. More than 2400 questions in categories such as: The past, Culture and famous people, Nature and Science, Geography, Sport and common knowledge.


Morsom og lærerig familiequiz om Danmark.

Hvad bør alle dansker vide om deres land? Find ud af det i dette spændende spil - hvilken dansk politiker har en dyr smag og bærer ofte Gucci-tasker? Hvilken placering fik de danske badmintonherrer ved EM for hold i Amsterdam 2012? Hvad er navnet på restaurant Noma en forkortelse af? - og meget, meget mere.

Masser af nye spørgsmål, nyt lækkert design og sjov spilteknik sørger for mange underholdende og belærende stunder for hele familien.

Spillet indeholder 2.400 spørgsmål fordelt på seks forskellige kategorier: Før i tiden, Kultur og kendte, Natur og videnskab, Geografisk, Sportsligt og Almen viden.

Test din viden og lær mere i denne herlige spørgeleg om Danmark.

135579.description:
Gold seekers come over sea (by ship) and over land (by horse). With the gold they have found they can buy tools. These tools give you extras during the game and you will need them as well. The goal is to collect 6 points, the tools are worth 1 or 2 points.

In a game turn you roll the dice and walk/sail exact the amount on the board. There you can have special actions. These are: collection coins, collecting cards (you can use them during the game) or flipping over tiles (water becomes land, en land becomes water). Most of the tiles have on the reverse side special events that will happen. Some are good, like collecting gold, some are bad like a storm.

To buy tools you have to go to the shops, which are on the side of the game board. You have to walk/sail of the board to collect them.
135579.name: Travalgo

135580.name: The Basement Collection
135580.description:
The Basement Collection features a compilation of Flash games from the unique mind of Edmund McMillen (Super Meat Boy, Binding of Isaac). This compendium includes Triachnid, Coil, the original Meat Boy, Aether, Grey-Matter, Spewer, Time Fcuk, and a huge amount of unlockable content and extras!

Source: The Publisher Website.

135581.name: Pointless: The Travel Game
135581.description: POINTLESS, it’s the game where the most obscure answer is the best answer! Based on the witty and compelling BBC 1 TV quiz show, this travel game brings the fun and knowledge from the show into a game to play either on the move or sat at home with family or friends. The object of the game is to be the player or team with the LEAST number of points at the end of the six rounds. Players or teams give one answer to each question. There are two selections per question.

135582.name: Wylosuj damę trefl
135582.description:
Wylosuj damę trefl is a polish game wich is rather a joke than a real game but it has characteristics of a game. (e.g. there is a winner and loser)

The first player takes the traditional card game deck and shuffles it. The second player takes one card from the deck. If the chosen card is a Queen of Clubs the second player wins. If not, the first player wins.

135583.name: Pack Up! Game
135583.description:
Publisher's Description:
An entertaining game of sorting items into the correct containers using lists. This is a great way to encourage your child to think quickly and improve organisational skills.

In this game 24 tiles are placed face-down and players are each given a list of items to find. Players on their turn look at a tile to see if it matches an item on their list, taking the tile if it does.

135584.name: Panzer Corps Grand Campaign '44 West

videogamecompilation.142089: Panzer Corps Grand Campaign Mega Pack '39 - '45

135584.description:
A new front has opened in the west against the German Wehrmacht! With the Allies landing in Normandy and the Wehrmacht busy fighting a defensive battle in Italy, the end begins to draw near.

Panzer Corps Grand Campaign ’44 West comes packed with 14 all-new scenarios of some of the war’s most important and renowned battles, from the landings at Anzio and Normandy, to the intense combat around Caen and Cassino. Players even face the ill-fated Operation Market Garden, but unusually from the German perspective.

Source: The Publisher Website.

135585.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater HD
135585.description:
User Summary

Finally, the original Tony Hawk Pro Skater and Tony Hawk Pro Skater 2 arrive on the PC. This remake plays like the original titles with updated, high definition graphics. A download pack adds some THPS 3 levels along with the ability to use reverts.

135586.name: Zen Garden
135586.description:
Zen Garden is a handmade, limited edition boardgame using 10mm miniatures to simulate a battle between two squads of Samurai in a snow-covered garden.

The board is a small zen garden upon which miniatures are moved with the help of movement sticks (to determine ranges and movement) and dice.

An activation system similar to the one found in other games by Ganesha Games (such as Song of Blades and Heroes) makes sure that the turn length and the number of actions performed by every model varies.

Each differently armed samurai has a card detailing the warrior's combat skill with various weapons and the amount of protection offered by his armor. The card is flipped when the samurai is wounded, showing reduced values on the back.

The game was designed by Massimo Moscarelli and sold exclusively online and at conventions. The rulebook is in Italian but an English translation is available as a free download on the ganesha games website.

135589.name: Halo Conquest
135589.description:
Halo Conquest

A game of Conquest

By Eli Silver

In this game, you play as the legendary Master Chief as you attempt to complete missions of vital importance. The Covenant have once again attacked the UNSC, and you are needed to stop them.
When you start a new game, you can pick any skulls you want. Like the Halo games, the skulls will make the mission harder. However, if you are using the scoring, they will also multiply your score. Choose a mission, receive your starting equipment, and then set out.
During your turn, you will advance or retreat, then fire at the enemy (assuming you have ammo). Afterwards, the enemy will fire back, (assuming the enemy is still alive). You'll have the option to take cover and reduce the likelihood of bieng hit, or stand in the open and get a better shot. You can toss Grenades, snipe the enemy, or bash them to death with a melee. You can also pick up weapons from dead enemies.
When a zone is clear, you can advance to the next zone, and then the next, hoping to complete your mission.
Good luck!

135590.name: NHL Breakaway 98
135590.description:
Back of the Box

BREAKAWAY REALISM
- All 26 NHL teams and over 600 players from the NHLPA
- Supports N64's Hi-Res Mode and features Acclaim Sports' Proprietary Motion Capture Animation
- Variable Player Sizes, from hulking defensemen down to speedy wingers
- Team scouting reports by Keith Tkachuk, 1996-97 NHL Goal Scoring Champion
- Playbook Based AI: Teams play their actual game styles; forecheck, trap, dump and chase

TOP-SHELF ACTION
- Full Nintendo 64 Rumble Pak support!
- 5 gameplay modes: Exhibition, season, playoffs, practice and shoot-out modes
- Momentum Based Checking System - Individual player weights and velocities create an unprecedented array of checking animations
- Symbol Based Player Passing - the ultimate passing system
- Season and playoff stat tracking in over 45 categories - League Leaders in 20 categories!

TOTAL TEAM MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
- Create Players - Assigned name actually appears on the player's jersey
- Sign and release free agents
- Season wins provide bonus points which improve coaching, player development, injury therapies and more
- Multi-player trades - swap up to six players in a single transaction
- Advanced Coaching Strategies - set style for physical play, power play and penalty killing

135592.name: Mud and Blood 2
135592.description:
Mud and Blood 2 (MnB2) is a World War II real-time strategy (RTS) game based on small-squad tactics and randomized sandbox game play. It is set in the period of August 1944, during operation Lüttich. You control the Allied forces, and your only goal is to hold your ground and make sure that the Germans don't punch through your defense line for as long as possible while your Headquarters relocates away from battle. There is no "winning" in MnB2, as the Germans will keep charging your defenses indefinitely. You can only aim to survive as many waves as is possible, while getting as many points as you can. It will be unfair, random, and brutal.

Source: The Game Website.

135594.name: Monopoly (NES)
135594.description:
Back of the Box

This special MONOPOLY game brings to life all the wheeling, dealing, money-making fun of the world's most popular board game - and adds the fast action, hands-on excitement of the NES! There's visual entertainment with the animated Rich Uncle Pennybags and Community Chest and Chance Cards, and the speedy sports car and other tokens that zoom around the board. Now listen for voice enhancemants such as the "jailer" who kicks Rich Uncle Pennybags out of Jail, and the digitized sound of the train whistles on the Railroad spaces. Like a real estate big shot, you let computer "accounting" keep track of your cash, assets, properties, houses and hotels. You can play with real, live real estate moguls, or take on the computer opponents, who might be beginners - or savvy big-time traders! The MONOPOLY game everyone grows up with, plus the NES... all in all, it's a real sweet deal!

135596.name: Gold oder Pech
135596.description:
Simple luck-based game for the very young. The game consists of 6 dice cards, numbered 1-6, 72 luck cards and a die. The luck cards are distributed onto the dice cards. The active player rolls the die and picks a luck card from the corresponding stack, then follows the instructions (receive or give gold or pitch). If a player gives out gold or bad luck, s/he can choose the recipient. After two stacks have been emptied, the player with the highest postive difference between gold and pitch is the winner.
No individual designer is credited. The games was designed and published by a handicapped people's workshop in Germany and is based on one of Grimm's fairy tales, Mother Hulda.

135597.name: Medieval Puzzles & Enigmas
135597.description:
From the back of the box:

Welcome, gallant knights! Time to take part in the greatest tournament organized in honor of King Arthur and his queen, Guinevere. No physical courage or high morals required. Patience, cleverness, and cunning are all you need in these quick-witted, brain jousting games. The object of the game: to be the smartest and most cunning of the knights assembled at the Round Table.

Includes:

156 cards divided into six puzzle categories: Logic, Observation, Numbers, Riddles, Pictograms, and Move it, Solve It
Book containing the rules of the game and the solutions to the puzzles
Score book to fill in during the fiendish challenges of the tournament
Sand timer




(This is a trivia/puzzle-solving game where the objective is to be the first to correctly answer puzzles of varying difficulty from 4 of the 6 available categories.)

135598.name: Pub Trivia
135598.description:
From the seller's web page:

Bring the fun of Pub Trivia to your home! Grab some friends and play everyone's favorite team trivia game. The game includes 1000 questions in 5 different categories (Entertainment, Sports and Recreation, Science, History and Anything Goes) so everyone has the chance to contribute in their area of expertise! Just like trivia night at your favorite watering hole, one person will stand up front to read out all the questions. The rest form their teams. Put your heads together, because it will take every team member to come out ahead!

135599.name: Resident Evil 6: Archives
135599.description:
User Summary

This Special Edition of Resident Evil 6 was released exclusively in North America for the Xbox 360. For the PlayStation 3 Special Edition, try Resident Evil 6: Anthology. For European/Japanese Special Editions, which only contained miscellaneous collector's merchandise, try the regular Resident Evil 6 entry.

Back of the Box

Includes:

- Resident Evil 6
- Resident Evil Code: Veronica X HD
- Resident Evil 4 HD
- Resident Evil 5: Gold Edition
- Resident Evil Degeneration (DVD Movie)

135600.name: Resident Evil 6: Anthology
135600.description:
User Summary

This Special Edition of Resident Evil 6 is exclusively released in North America for the PlayStation 3 console. For the Xbox 360 Special Edition, check Resident Evil 6: Archives. For the European/Japanese Special Editions, check the original Resident Evil 6 entry.

Includes:

- Resident Evil 5 Gold Edition
- Resident Evil 4 HD
- Resident Evil 3: Nemesis
- Resident Evil 2
- Resident Evil: Director's Cut

135601.description:
Les mots à la bouche (The Words in the mouth) is a game that allows you to animate discussions throughout a meal shared with friends, family, colleagues or acquaintances. A different game is available for each stage of the evening, all with the theme of the kitchen. Your table and utensils are thus transformed into a giant game board!

The stakes? The losers do the dishes!

The box contains:


A book of 120 pages to organize the perfect evening!
All accessories for up to 12 guests:


in all, 236 cards representing nearly 500 topics or actions for the game

30 coaster-shaped cards for the apéritifs
60 canapé-shaped cards for the appetizers
12 original place cards
80 questions for the entrée
12 twistor cards that will make the tongue twist
30 coaster-shaped cards for the main course
30 cards for dessert
30 allspice action cards that will spice up your meal
12 challenge cards for the digestifs
135601.name: Les mots à la bouche

135602.name: Broken Sword: Director's Cut

videogamehonor.32774: 2010 British Academy Game Awards Best Story/Narrative of the Year Nominee

135602.description:
User Summary

The Director's Cut of Broken Sword: The Shadow of the Templars includes an additional chapter of the story seen from Nico's perspective. Unlike the original it is now impossible for George to die. One murder was altered and icons now appear to alert the player to items they can interact with.

135604.name: Cake Mania

videogamehonor.32699: 2008 British Academy Game Awards Best Casual/Social Game of the Year Nominee

135604.description:
From the Publisher's Website

Based on the hit online game from Sandlot Games, Cake Mania for the Nintendo DS translates this fast-paced culinary crisis into the perfect Touch Screen experience. Wait for customer requests, bake their cakes, ice and decorate them, then hand them out and collect your cash. Serve up seasonal confectionary delights to a variety of customers and see if you have what it takes to save the Evans' Bakery!

Jill has returned from culinary school only to find her beloved grandparents' bakery closed down. Business has taken a drastic downturn because a new Mega-Mart store opened in the neighborhood. Help Jill upgrade her kitchen with state-of-the-art baking tools while serving her increasingly difficult customers so she can ultimately earn enough money to re-open her grandparents' shop!

-Includes the entire original online Cake Mania game plus the full Back to the Bakery expansion pack

-Over 80 fast-paced levels of baking, each with a specific Baker's Goal to achieve

-Use the Touch Screen to hand out menus, collect your cash, and bake, frost and decorate cakes

-Customize your kitchen by purchasing upgrades including ovens, shoes, decorations and frosting machines

-Bake in five exotic locales-Home Bakery, Beach Front, Circus, Casino and Hawaii

-Serve seasonal customers like Cupid and Santa Claus custom holiday cakes

-Maximize tips from customers by handing out cupcakes and tuning into their favorite TV shows

135605.name: Broken Sword: The Serpent's Curse
135605.description:
Played via a point and click or touch user interface, the player guides protagonists George Stobbart and Nicole "Nico" Collard, who at the beginning of the game meet by chance at a Parisian art gallery, where they witness a man disquised as a pizza man murdering another man and stealing a seemingly worthless painting. George and Nico then get thrown in an investigation and travel to various locations.

Source: Wikipedia, "Broken Sword: The Serpent's Curse", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

videogame.70762: Broken Sword II: The Smoking Mirror

135607.name: Broken Sword Trilogy

videogamecompilation.70762: Broken Sword II: The Smoking Mirror

135607.description:
User Summary

The Broken Sword Trilogy contains the first three games in the series.

135608.name: Spectral Force: Genesis
135608.description:
Back of the Box

A Unique Mix of 3 Great Genres!

War Sim: A blend of diplomacy, taxation, affairs of the realm and war strategies.

RTS: Real Time Strategy; Control your armies on the battlefield in real time.

RPG: Role Playing Game; Command powerful heroes, level them up and increase your strike force.

Manage all three aspects and unify a broken kingdom!

135609.name: Dwarven Euchre
135609.description:
Dwarven Euchre is a fantasy-themed evolution of a popular trick-taking card game.

The game is normally played with four people -- two teams of partners sitting across the table from each other. Each round involves one set of partners bidding on a trump suit, cards are played around the table as the bidding team tries to win the required number of tricks. Between rounds, a battle map is updated with results. The goal is for one team to capture the center hex on the map. Depending on board position and hand results, partners may earn 'reinforcement' draws in future rounds to make their hands stronger.

Partners may discuss board position between rounds, but within a round they must anticipate other player actions. Some example decisions: "My partner has this trick so far - should I play trump or save it for later?" and "My opponent called trump - should I draw some of it out?"

Differences between Dwarven and traditional Euchre include fantasy-themed cards, the battle map, sorcerer wildcards, and reinforcement draws. The rules contain example play and a two-player version.

135610.name: G.I. Joe: Battle for DC
135610.description:
The date is December 8, 1987. Ronald Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev are set to sign the Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces Treaty. The Cold War is fast thawing and only one organization can prevent it: COBRA. These terrorists have launched a massed attack aimed at crippling both the USA and USSR and making sure the Cold War continues. To achieve this, they have attacked Washington D.C. and captured Reagan. Gobachev would have been captured, but G. I. Joe, having received a last minute warning, has deployed. Now in the streets of America’s capital the Joes must save the day.

G.I. Joe: Battle for DC combines aspects of Battle Line and Batman: Poker gegen Joker. Players battle over locations in Washington DC by laying down cards representing various characters from the G.I. Joe universe. Each has a numerical rating from one to 12 and a color suit, allowing for card combinations that will aid you in the battle for DC. In addition, the Joes must protect Gorbachev and rescue Reagan.There are also special cards which can alter the battle and a naval control aspect that allows players to draw an extra card if they control the Potomac River.

135611.name: Owl Game
135611.description:
The owl game was one of the most popular games during Mozart's time in Salzburg. It is a game of pure luck, with three dice for two or more players.
Each player receives a decided number of chips (e.g. twelve) and puts half of them in the center of the board. The first player then throws the dice. The combination of the three values of the dice can be found on the board and the instructions written underneath each combination must be followed. If, for example, the field says "bezahlt" (or, in the mediaevel version, "bezalt", meaning: paid), the player has to pay the specified number of chips into the center of the board. But, if it says "nimmt" (or, in the mediaevel version, "nimbt" meaning: take), the player takes the specified number of chips fromt he center of the board. If a player cannot pay sufficient quantities of chips, he places the remaining chips from his/her stash into the center and drops out of this round of the game.

The game lasts until only one player is left with chips, or until any one player has thrown three sixes. In this lucky case, she/he gets all the chips fromt he center of the board and is thus the big winner of the round. Then, a new round can be started.

135612.description:
Part of the Dungeon Heroes Kickstarter campaign, the Dungeon Heroes: Expansion Pack contains two modules for the base game.

The Dragon & The Damsel, which features an exciting classic tale of rescuing a damsel in distress from an all powerful dragon. If you rescue the damsel, she joins the party as a 5th Hero and lends her aid to your quest for treasure. Be careful though, for while you are searching for her you may encounter the toughest monster yet, the Dragon!

Lords of the Undead, which features the ghostly story of a lady long forgotten and a necromancer dabbling in dark magic. Amongst this angst, the Heroes come across an underground marketplace offering its help.
135612.name: Dungeon Heroes: Expansion Pack

135614.name: Fifty Shades of Grey: Red Room Expansion Pack

135101.name: Fifty Shades of Grey Party Game

135614.description:
Add some extra spice to your Fifty Shades of Grey party game with the expansion pack that promises to raise the stakes in this outrageously fun party game, and will have everyone talking long after the game has finished.

The games contains:
- 200 Red Room Questions
- 1 die
- 1 rulebook

135616.name: Port Royale 3: Dawn of Pirates
135616.description:
The new DLC, “Dawn of Pirates”, adds a new campaign to the Caribbean empire-building game along with unlocking online leaderboards and an “Ironman” mode. In the new campaign, players will set sail as the scourge of the seas – a bloodthirsty treasure-seeking pirate.

The Dawn of Pirates DLC for Windows PC is available via Steam and the Kalypso Launcher.

Dawn of Pirates offers you a whole new single-player campaign in which you get to stir up trouble in the Caribbean — as a pirate. Your aim in this DLC is to become the most notorious pirate in the Caribbean by raiding and plundering unsuspecting cities and poorly guarded convoys on the high seas. A new pirate-themed campaign offer players the chance to enjoy Port Royale 3 from the view of one of their most challenging foes! Arrr matey, what are you waiting for? Set sail!

Features of the Dawn of Pirates DLC:
- A new pirate-themed campaign with adjusted interface and gameplay
- Ironman-mode challenges you to play through the campaign without save-points
- An online ranking-system with a global high-score-list for Normal as well as Ironman modes

Source: The Publisher Website.

135617.name: Port Royale 3: Harbour Master
135617.description:
With the Harbour Master DLC you can enhance Port Royale 3 with six completely new building types, several decoration objects for your cities and with an economic adviser, who will give you useful hints. In addition you will now have more control over the defence of your cities and you will be able to build ships on your own!

Features:
- Six new buildings (e.g. embassy or fire department)
- Decoration objects like plants, statues or several pavings
- More control over the extension of the defence lines
- Economic adviser who gives useful advice when necessary
- Build your own ships

The Harbour Master DLC is available via online distributors like Kalypso Launcher and via Steam.

Source: The Publisher Website.

135618.name: Panzer Corps Grand Campaign '42 - '43 West

videogamecompilation.142089: Panzer Corps Grand Campaign Mega Pack '39 - '45

135618.description:
The focus of the Grand Campaign series now moves to the Western Front as the British and American armies and their allies begin their counter-offensives to push Germany out of captured territory. With a series of hit-and-run raids, the Allies are probing German defenses on the coasts before launching the expected European mainland invasion. The task for the player is simple, repel the Allies’ efforts and push them back!

Grand Campaign ’42-’43 West features 14 new scenarios, from the landings at Dieppe and Salerno, to battles at Syracuse and Messina in Italy, including a host of new features implemented from the recently-released Panzer Corps: Afrika Korps.

Source: The Publisher Website.

135619.name: Tropico 4: Pirate Heaven
135619.description:
Tropico is becoming a pirate hideaway, courtesy of new DLC available for the Windows PC version of the game. In the newly released "Pirate Heaven" DLC for Tropico 4, players can now ignore those pesky international blockades, importing goods via the new Smuggler's Hut building, and boost their naval power courtesy of the new "Sailor" character trait.

As part of the new DLC, your minions will now be able to resort to piracy as a way of making quick money, though all that ship hijacking, ransoming, pillaging and plundering is sure to attract international attention (and ire), so you'll need to build up your defenses to protect Tropico from invasion! Last but never least; players can dress up their female avatars with the new "Pirate Queen" outfit, giving just a bit more flair to your in-game persona.

Source: The Game Website.

135620.name: Tropico 4: Quick Dry Cement
135620.description:
In the previously released “Plantador” add-on content for Tropico 4, El Presidente was on his way to becoming a master gardener, and now with the “Quick Dry Cement” add-on, he’s moved into building his own concrete jungle. The new content adds the new Cement Factory building, along with additional character traits, costumes and more.

Key Features:
Building: Cement Factory (accelerates all constructions on the island)
Character Trait: Constructor (free cement factory, construction workers gain skill faster)
Character Outfit / Vanity Item: Engineer helmet (for male and female avatars)
Mission theme: The largest city in the Caribbean – build a huge city across the whole
island while fighting all kinds of disasters
Decorations: Tropican flagpole, Small park, Flower bed 2, Flowering tree 2, Constructor statue

Source: The Game Website.

135621.name: Tropico 4: Megalopolis
135621.description:
The Megalopolis DLC is compatible with the original version of Tropico 4 for Windows PC, and Tropico 4 Gold Edition.

Megalopolis DLC contents

Build the largest city in the Caribbean! It’s up to you to decide how to deal with the problems that come with a massive influx of immigrants looking to join your society.
